1_1FZxKCwPzn7rvLaNi2rE7QHwvyq14XVWzi.body: i use Iridium, it's chromium without all the phone-home stuff, i dig it a lot. Iridium coupled with the ZeroNet chrome plugin is pretty nice. Without the zeronet plugin things like scriptsafe don't exactly work correctly, all my plugins work better with ZN this way though.
